org.bremersee.dccon.api

Interface DomainGroupManagementApi


  • @Validated
public interface DomainGroupManagementApi
    The domain group management api.
    Author:
    Christian Bremer

                produces="application/json",
                method=GET)

        Parameters:
        groupName - the group name
        Returns:

                method=DELETE)
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> deleteGroup(@PathVariable(value="groupName")
                                                                                                                                                                                          String groupName)
        Delete domain group.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the group name
        Returns:
